title: Sales Process
description: Test for Business Development team based on the 1pager on wiki. Check your knowledge on our Sales Process.

answers.body: Qualification call with a lead. During the call I’m taking the notes
Converting the lead into an account to log the call in Salesforce
If the account qualifies for a pre-opp/opp, creating an opp in SF
Creating an opp slack channel #pre-opp-account_name or  #opp-account_name
Uploading all the materials and pinning them to the #opp-account_name channel
Creating a ticket to the Pre-sales team using Bob the Bot (I’m typing in /bd-support-request in my newly created opp channel and passing all the needed info)

Bob automatically creates a google drive folder for the opp materials together with  
necessary estimation and proposal templates
Pre-sales team receives your request and assigns supporter to help you with the opp

published_attributes.title: You’re about to have a qualification call with your lead. Choose the right steps in the correct order, you’d take.

answers.body: Qualification call with a lead. During the call I’m taking the notes
Converting the lead into an account to log the call in Salesforce
If the account qualifies for a pre-opp/opp, creating an opp in SF
Creating an opp slack channel #pre-opp-account_name or  #opp-account_name
Uploading all the materials and pinning them to the #opp-account_name channel
Creating a ticket to the Pre-sales team using Bob the Bot (I’m typing in /bd-support-request in my newly created opp channel and passing all the needed info)

Bob automatically creates a google drive folder for the opp materials together with  
necessary estimation and proposal templates
Pre-sales team receives your request and assigns supporter to help you with the opp

draft_attributes.title: You’re about to have a qualification call with your lead. Choose the right steps in the correct order, you’d take.

answers.body: Proper estimation is a key thing in the sales process. Our Pre-sales prepares and sends tailored-made estimates to clients 1 day before the scheduled call to discuss those
It’s advisable to prepare estimates for every client we talk to
It’s not recommended to send a client ready estimations before getting a confirmation he’s ready to meet and discuss the estimates
Check during the qualification and expert calls if the client is prospective. If yes, you can follow with estimations
It’s recommended to send a client estimation documents first and then schedule a call to discuss the proposal. Expert’s presence on the call is mandatory!

published_attributes.title: What are our good practises when it comes to estimations?

answers.body: Proper estimation is a key thing in the sales process. Our Pre-sales prepares and sends tailored-made estimates to clients 1 day before the scheduled call to discuss those
It’s advisable to prepare estimates for every client we talk to
It’s not recommended to send a client ready estimations before getting a confirmation he’s ready to meet and discuss the estimates
Check during the qualification and expert calls if the client is prospective. If yes, you can follow with estimations
It’s recommended to send a client estimation documents first and then schedule a call to discuss the proposal. Expert’s presence on the call is mandatory!

answers.body: Frontend Developer 2.00; Backend Developer 1.00; Product Designer 0.75; QA 0.25; PM 0.25
Frontend Developer 2.00; Backend Developer 2.00; Product Designer 1.50; QA 0.3; PM 0.3
Frontend Developer 2.00; Backend Developer 1.00; Product Designer 1.50; QA 0.3; PM 0.3
Frontend Developer 2.00 (monthly rate); Backend Developer 1.00 (monthly rates); Product Designer 10.00 (daily); QA 0.5; PM 0.5

How would you write the product quantity in SF in your opp?

answers.body: 1-2 days Workshops
Scoping Session (At the end Client receives a short report with the scope of work and development road + estimations)
Design Teaser (if it’s a key lead, I can offer the client Design Teaser for free)
Product Discovery Sprint (PDS) (At the end Client receives a report Clickable prototype - couple of screens)

published_attributes.title: Your lead has some materials and plan for a product. He’s looking for a partner to have the project done. What would you offer your client additionally to assure him we’d be a great fit for this work?

answers.body: 1-2 days Workshops
Scoping Session (At the end Client receives a short report with the scope of work and development road + estimations)
Design Teaser (if it’s a key lead, I can offer the client Design Teaser for free)
Product Discovery Sprint (PDS) (At the end Client receives a report Clickable prototype - couple of screens)

draft_attributes.title: Your lead has some materials and plan for a product. He’s looking for a partner to have the project done. What would you offer your client additionally to assure him we’d be a great fit for this work?

answers.body:
I’m requesting Master Service Agreement on #bd-inbound channel, mentioning the
Sales Operations team (@so). I need to provide SO team with client’s corporate name, name & surname of the signer and email address

I’m requesting preparing MSA (Master Service Agreement) and SOW (Statement of Work) on the #bd-inbound channel, mentioning the Sales Operations team (@so). I need to provide the following: client’s company name, name & surname of the signer (client), earliest start date, team members (products), deposit amount and rates with currency. When it’s done, I’m sending the contracts to the client for a signature

I’m preparing MSA and SOW contracts by myself. To do so, I’m asking the Sales Operations Team (on #bd-inbound channel) for the links to the contracts templates. Once I’m done, I’m sending the pdf versions of contracts to my client via email to be signed. After all, I’m asking the Sales Operations team for uploading the contracts to the Salesforce and that’s it!

I’m asking the Sales Operations team on #bd-inbound channel for help with preparing both MSA and SOW contracts. I’m providing in the message the most important info like: company name, earliest start date, team members (products), deposit amount and rates with currency. Once the contracts are ready and checked I’m providing the client’s name & surname and email address so the SO team could send the contracts to my client for the signature. The signed contracts go to Salesforce automatically. That’s it!

published_attributes.title: You have confirmation that a client would like to work with us - we will need to send the contract to the client. What are the steps?

draft_attributes.title: You have confirmation that a client would like to work with us - we will need to send the contract to the client. What are the steps?

answers.body: PMO team’s help is much needed when booking talents for new projects. I’m adding Klaudia Kalinowska to the opp slack channel giving her info on the needed team members for the project and all start dates.
Requesting talents in SF is enough

I’m closing the opp in SF, adding the products to the opp and marking the checkbox ‘talent request’. PMO help is needed here, so I’m inviting PMO team to the opp slack channel, mentioning them and giving the info on the needed team members and all start dates.

I’m closing the opp in SF, adding the products to the opp and marking the checkbox ‘talent request’. The PMO team will see in Salesforce that I’m in need of developers for the project. If any problems occur, I’m contacting Klaudia Kalinowska from the PMO team.

published_attributes.title: So you have a contract signed by the client and now you need to book the team for the project. How do you do this?

answers.body: PMO team’s help is much needed when booking talents for new projects. I’m adding Klaudia Kalinowska to the opp slack channel giving her info on the needed team members for the project and all start dates.
Requesting talents in SF is enough

I’m closing the opp in SF, adding the products to the opp and marking the checkbox ‘talent request’. PMO help is needed here, so I’m inviting PMO team to the opp slack channel, mentioning them and giving the info on the needed team members and all start dates.

I’m closing the opp in SF, adding the products to the opp and marking the checkbox ‘talent request’. The PMO team will see in Salesforce that I’m in need of developers for the project. If any problems occur, I’m contacting Klaudia Kalinowska from the PMO team.

draft_attributes.title: So you have a contract signed by the client and now you need to book the team for the project. How do you do this?

answers.body: Red flags, good sides, any contract changes and promised discounts
All the information about the client and the whole process that ended in signing the contracts
All the information about the client and the whole process so far, all the unusual changes that are implemented in this project, any changes in the original MSA, discounts, red flags and good sides
All the information about the whole process that ended in signing the contracts, contract changes. After the call, I’m sending the client one email - with an introduction to PM and AM

published_attributes.title: You’re having a project handover call with a Project Manager and Account Manager in an hour. What info about the client and the project will you pass on to the assigned PM and AM?

answers.body: Red flags, good sides, any contract changes and promised discounts
All the information about the client and the whole process that ended in signing the contracts
All the information about the client and the whole process so far, all the unusual changes that are implemented in this project, any changes in the original MSA, discounts, red flags and good sides
All the information about the whole process that ended in signing the contracts, contract changes. After the call, I’m sending the client one email - with an introduction to PM and AM

draft_attributes.title: You’re having a project handover call with a Project Manager and Account Manager in an hour. What info about the client and the project will you pass on to the assigned PM and AM?

answers.body: Check company’s LinkedIn page, write a conversation scenario that you could use during the call
Be on a call a few minutes before, with your camera on. Check lead’s conversation with a lead master and look for the company information on the Internet (LinkedIn, company website).
Read email from the prospect. Evaluate what talent will be needed in the project. Create a brief proposition for a prospect you could present during the call.
Based on prospect inquiry and information you have on the company, prepare a short presentation you can share with a customer

published_attributes.title: What are the best practices before a qualification call with a prospective customer?

answers.body: Check company’s LinkedIn page, write a conversation scenario that you could use during the call
Be on a call a few minutes before, with your camera on. Check lead’s conversation with a lead master and look for the company information on the Internet (LinkedIn, company website).
Read email from the prospect. Evaluate what talent will be needed in the project. Create a brief proposition for a prospect you could present during the call.
Based on prospect inquiry and information you have on the company, prepare a short presentation you can share with a customer

draft_attributes.title: What are the best practices before a qualification call with a prospective customer?

answers.body: To share leads with Inbound team members - when new lead lands in the queue - any Salesforce user that belongs to the Inbound Lead Queue can pick it up
To distribute leads between active queue members, depending on the type of leads they can receive (dogs / rabbits / key leads)
To segment leads into categories such as dog, rabbit
To distribute leads between Inbound team members fairly, so even if you’re on holidays, you’ll receive a lead and have an equal share of prospects

published_attributes.title: What is the purpose of a leads queue in Salesforce?

answers.body: To share leads with Inbound team members - when new lead lands in the queue - any Salesforce user that belongs to the Inbound Lead Queue can pick it up
To distribute leads between active queue members, depending on the type of leads they can receive (dogs / rabbits / key leads)
To segment leads into categories such as dog, rabbit
To distribute leads between Inbound team members fairly, so even if you’re on holidays, you’ll receive a lead and have an equal share of prospects

draft_attributes.title: What is the purpose of a leads queue in Salesforce?

answers.body: Creating a calendar invite, uploading all materials to opp/pre-opp slack channel, leading the conversation with a prospect, setting the agenda and establishing next steps.
Creating a Google Drive folder with all gathered info on the prospect, making an introduction to an expert and letting him lead the call, assisting expert, summarizing action points proposed
Sharing all available materials with an expert, making an introduction - so the Technical Expert can contact prospect to conduct an Expert Call
Creating a calendar invite, information handover, discussing Client’s needs with an Expert in order to prepare estimations

published_attributes.title: What is your responsibility while organizing an expert call?

answers.body: Creating a calendar invite, uploading all materials to opp/pre-opp slack channel, leading the conversation with a prospect, setting the agenda and establishing next steps.
Creating a Google Drive folder with all gathered info on the prospect, making an introduction to an expert and letting him lead the call, assisting expert, summarizing action points proposed
Sharing all available materials with an expert, making an introduction - so the Technical Expert can contact prospect to conduct an Expert Call
Creating a calendar invite, information handover, discussing Client’s needs with an Expert in order to prepare estimations
